about.details:
Founded in 2013, Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global Limited, previously known as Lohats Ventures Private Limited, provides specialized engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) services for the construction of buildings and infrastructure facilities.

Sathlokhar Synergys provides construction services for industrial, warehousing, commercial, institutional and pharmaceutical projects, solar projects, hospitals, hotels, resorts and villas etc. The company also provides installation of mechanical, electrical and plumbing networks in construction projects.

The company has completed projects in 4 states of India, namely Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh and West Bengal. The company also undertakes EPC projects for government agencies through competitive bidding processes. Sathlokhar Synergys is also an authorized dealer of TATA Power Solar Systems Ltd. for providing installation, sales, commissioning and maintenance services for its products as per mutually agreed terms and conditions in connection with its solar power projects.

The company employs a total of 118 people in the departments of accounting and finance, human resources and administration, engineering and operations, procurement and material management and safety and security.

faqs.question: What is the Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO is a SME IPO of 6638000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹92.93 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹140 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on July 30, 2024, and closes on August 1, 2024.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO opens on July 30, 2024 and closes on August 1, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO?
faqs.answer: Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO will be done on Friday, August 2, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, August 5, 2024. Check the Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sathlokhar Synergys E&C Global IPO listing date is on Tuesday, August 6, 2024.
